    The Magic Mat™

    Instant absorption. Quick drying. Always fresh.

    £29.99 £67.00
    Choose variants
    Select color
    Forest Green
    Select size
    Select pack size
    Trusted by 85,000+ customers Ships within 48 hours Money-back guarantee Carbon neutral delivery

    Small: 40cm x 60cm / 16in x 24in
    Regular: 50cm x 80cm / 20in x 32in

    The Magic Mat™ is the ultimate quick dry bath mat that effectively absorbs water, keeping your floors dry, safe and looking amazing!

    Its unique multi-layered design quickly traps, absorbs, and dries moisture. No more having to deal with gross, soggy bath mats - The Magic Mat™ has you covered!

    Shop worry-free with our 30 Day Money-Back Guarantee!

    Click here to check out our new Rectangular Magic Mats!

    KEEPS FLOORS CLEAN, DRY & SAFE

    The Magic Mat™ absorbs water before it’s spread all over the bathroom floor - no more hazardous trails of water throughout the house! Not only does it absorb water quickly but it also dries fast, so you can say goodbye to gross, soggy bath mats once and for all!

    STAYS CLEAN, FRESH & ODORLESS

    Traditional bath mats collect and hold dirt and bacteria, and never fully dry out which causes them to smell and mildew. The MagicMat™ is built with Quick Dry Technology, which can help prevent any mold, mildew, or unpleasant odor. Plus, the Magic Mat ™ is super easy to wash! For washing instructions click here.

    PREVENTS SLIPPING

    Designed with a non-slip bottom that grips any floor, the Magic Mat™ sticks flat to the floor and can be counted on to not slide around, fold, crumple or bunch up like traditional bath mats.

    PERFECT FOR ANYWHERE IN THE HOUSE

    The Magic Mat™ is not just a bath mat.. It’s the perfect all around mat that can be used anywhere in the house! Great for the front entrance, back entrance, bathroom, balcony door, kitchen, you name it!

    ULTRA SOFT & COMPACT

    Made with a soft, spongy material, the Magic Mat™ feels great on the feet! Its compact, sleek design ensures it will fit under any standard door without getting caught, snagged or jammed.

    HOW IT WORKS:

    The secret behind the Magic Mat™ is its multi-layer 4 layer design.

    • The surface layer traps moisture and allows it to pass through to the absorbent sponge layer.
    • Once accumulated in the sponge layer, water evaporates due to the open-cell structure which allows air to pass through the material.
    • The third layer consists of soft quick dry foam; this is what makes The Magic Mat soft and squishy!
    • The non-slip rubber bottom ensures the Magic Mat will always stay in place, unlike standard cotton bath mats which commonly slide around
    FAQ

    How fast does it dry after use?
    The Magic Mat dries within minutes. It absorbs water instantly and doesn’t stay soggy like traditional fabric mats.

    What makes the Magic Mat different from a regular bath mat?
    Most mats absorb water and hold it — leading to dampness, odors, and bacteria. The Magic Mat uses a 4-layer quick-dry design that absorbs water fast, dries quickly, resists mold, and stays firmly in place.

    Where does the water go? How does it absorb and dry so quickly?
    The top layer traps moisture and channels it into an ultra-absorbent sponge layer. Air flows through the open-cell structure, helping moisture evaporate fast. That’s how the Magic Mat stays dry — without soaking through or holding water.

    Does it really stay in place — even on tile or smooth floors?
    Yes. It has a textured, non-slip base that grips smooth bathroom floors and tiles with no bunching or sliding.

    Will it fit under my door?
    Yes — the Magic Mat is under 5mm thick, so it easily fits beneath most doors and doesn’t block robot vacuums, wheelchairs, or knee scooters.

    How do I clean the Magic Mat?
    For surface cleans, just wipe it down with a damp sponge (non-abrasive side) or smooth cloth. For deep cleans, use a mild cleaning spray or soap, then rinse with warm water and hang dry.

    Is it safe for kids, pets, and elderly?
    Absolutely. Its fast-drying surface, secure grip, and slim profile make it a safer option for families with kids, pets, or elderly individuals.

    What size should I get for my space?
    We offer two sizes:

    • Regular: Ideal for standard-sized bathrooms — fits perfectly outside showers, tubs, or in front of sinks
    • Small: Perfect for compact bathrooms, powder rooms, or narrow spaces


    How many Magic Mats do I need?
    Most customers get two per bathroom — one in front of the shower or tub, and another in front of the sink. If you love the dry, clean feel, consider adding more for your kitchen sink, entryway, or patio.

    Unanswered questions about our Magic Mat? Check out our full Magic Mat FAQ by clicking here.
